name: Web
Activity: Build and deploy your first website
description: Here you will learn how to build a website. You will be taught about html tags, upload & Share GitHub repo of project in the channel #web-and-mobile-app-development with the hashtag #cl-web-firweb. Completing this unit will earn you 100 karma points.

name: Web
description: You will be making a clone of Google. You will go through css and necessary elements. upload and share  GitHub repo of project in the channel #web-and-mobile-app-development with the hashtag #cl-web-gclone. Completing this unit will earn you 100 karma points.

name: Web
description:
